document_data.name: Shaliira Duon
document_data.mainbody: '''Shaliira Duon''' was an adventuress in [[Myth Drannor]] in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.History:
Shaliira was born in [[Deepingdale]] but in her youth traveled to [[Sembia]] with her [[elf|elven]] mother in search of her [[human]] father. However, they found the man had been assassinated in [[Ordulin]] by the [[Cult of the Dragon]]. Shaliira's mother was devastated and died soon after.

To make a living, Shaliira started to work in a tavern as a waitress and dancer. She started her training as a [[wizard]] in order to one day speak with her dead father and finally get to know him.

In time, she joined the [[Company of the Catlash]].

In 1370 DR, the Company decided to go to Myth Drannor in order to acquire some magic item to empower them.
document_data.Activities: Shaliira was a member of the Company of the Catlash.
document_data.Personality: Shaliira dreamed of becoming a well-regarded person. She always needed to belong to something, her Company, to a community, or to a group. Despite bad experiences with men in her days at the tavern in Ordulin, Shaliira always hoped to find a new friend in all the people she met.
